GE07bhg4c01u:551: nimittāni phalāny atra yuddhe viparītāni paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c01u:552: vijayino me rājya-prāptir ānando na bhaviṣyati kintu tad-viparīto 'nutāpa eva bhāvīti /
GE07bhg4c01u:553: nimitta-śabdaḥ phala-vācī kasmai nimittāyātra vasasi ity ādau tathā pratīteḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c01u:556: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave /
GE07bhg4c01u:557: na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca //31//
GE07bhg4c01u:558: Śrīdhara: kiṃ ca na cety ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:559: āhave yuddhe svajanaṃ hatvā śreyaḥ phalaṃ na paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c01u:560: vijayādikaṃ phalaṃ kiṃ na paśyasīti cet tatrāha na kāṅkṣa iti //31//
GE07bhg4c01u:561: Viśvanātha: śreyo na paśyāmīti dvāv imau puruṣau loke sūrya-maṇḍala-bhedinau /
GE07bhg4c01u:562: parivrāḍ yoga-yuktaś ca raṇe cābhimukhe hataḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:564: hantus tu na kim ap sukṛtam /
GE07bhg4c01u:565: nana dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ yaśo rājyaṃ vartate yuddhasyety ata āha na kāṅkṣa iti //31//
GE07bhg4c01u:566: Baladeva: evaṃ tattva-jñāna-pratikūlaṃ śokam uktvā tat-pratikūlāṃ viparīta-buddhim āha na ceti /
GE07bhg4c01u:567: āhave svajanaṃ hatvā śreyo naiva paśyāmīti /
GE07bhg4c01u:569: parivrāḍ yoga-yuktaś ca raṇe cābhimukhe hataḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:570: ity ādinā hatasya śreyaḥ-smaraṇāt hantur me na kiñcic chreyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:571: asvajanam iti vā cchedaḥ asvajana-vadhe 'pi śreyaso 'bhāvāt svajana-vadhe punaḥ kutastarāṃ tad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:572: nanu yaśo-rājya-lābho dṛṣṭaṃ phalam astīti cet tatrāha na kāṅkṣa iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:573: rājyādi-spṛhā-virahād upāye vijaye mama pravṛttir na yuktā,
GE07bhg4c01u:578: kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā /
GE07bhg4c01u:579: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca //32//
GE07bhg4c01u:580: ta ime 'vasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni ca /
GE07bhg4c01u:581: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c01u:582: mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ śyālāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā /
GE07bhg4c01u:583: etān na hantum icchāmi ghnato 'pi madhusūdana //34//
GE07bhg4c01u:584: api trailokyarājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahīkṛte /
GE07bhg4c01u:585: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāj janārdana //35///
GE07bhg4c01u:586: Śrīdhara: etad eva prapañcayati kiṃ no rājyena ity ādi sārdha-dvayena /
GE07bhg4c01u:588: yad-artham asmākaṃ rājyādikam apekṣitam te ete prāṇa-dhanāni tyaktvā tyāgam aṅgīkṛtya yuddhārtham avasthitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:589: ataḥ kim asmākaṃ rājyādibhiḥ kṛtyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:590: nanu yadi kṛpayā tvam etān na haṃsi tarhi tvām ete rājya-lobhena haniṣyanty eva /
GE07bhg4c01u:591: atas tvam evaitān hatvā rājyaṃ bhuṅkṣveti /
GE07bhg4c01u:595: trailokya-rājyasyāpi hetoḥ tat-prāpty-artham api hantuṃ necchāmi /
GE07bhg4c01u:599: gāḥ sarvendriya-vṛttīḥ vindasīti tvam eva me manogataṃ pratīhīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:601: prāṇān prāṇāśāṃ dhanāni9 dhanāśām iti laksaṇayā bodhyam /
GE07bhg4c01u:602: sva-prāṇa-vyaye 'pi sva-bandhu-sukhārthā rājya-spṛhā syāt teṣām apy atra nāśa-prāpter apārthaiva yuddhe pravṛttir iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:603: nanu tvaṃ cet kāruṇikas etān na hanyās tarhi te sva-rājyaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ kartuṃ tvām eva hanyur iti cet tatrāh etān iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:604: māṃ ghnato 'pi hiṃsato 'py etān hantum ahaṃ necchāmi /
GE07bhg4c01u:606: nanv anvayān hitvā dhṛtarāṣṭra-putrā eva hantavyā,
GE07bhg4c01u:607: bahu-duḥkha-dātṝṇāṃ teṣāṃ ghāte sukha-sambhavād iti cet tatrāha nihatyeti /
GE07bhg4c01u:608: dhārtarāṣṭrān duryodhanādīn nihatya sthitānāṃ naḥ pāṇḍāvānāṃ kā prītiḥ prasannatā syān na kāpīti acira-sukhābhāsa-spṛhayā ciratara-naraka-hetu-bhrāṛho na yogya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:609: he janārdaneti yady ete hantavyās tarhi bhūbhārāpahārī tvam eva tān hahi pareśasya te pāpa-gandha-sambandho na bhaved iti vyajyate //32-35//
GE07bhg4c01u:613: tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān svabāndhavān /
GE07bhg4c01u:614: svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava //36//
GE07bhg4c01u:615: Śrīdhara: nanu ca agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:616: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:617: iti smaraṇād agni-dāhādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir hetubhir ete tāvad ātatāyinaḥ ātatāyināṃ ca vadho yukta eva /
GE07bhg4c01u:624: yathoktaṃ yājñavalkyena smṛtyor virodhe nyāyas tu balavān vyavahārataḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:625: artha-śāstrāt tu balavān dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:627: tasmād ātatāyinām apy eteṣām ācāryādīnāṃ vadhe 'smākaṃ pāpam eva bhavet /
GE07bhg4c01u:628: anyāyyatvād adharmatvāc caitad vadhasya amutra ceha vā na sukhaṃ syād ity āha svajanam iti //36//
GE07bhg4c01u:629: Viśvanātha: nanu agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:630: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:634: ity ādi-vacanād eṣāṃ vadha ucita eveti /
GE07bhg4c01u:637: ātatāyinam āyāntam ity ādikam artha-śāstraṃ dharma-śāstrāt durbalam /
GE07bhg4c01u:638: yad uktaṃ yājñavalkyena artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti smṛtam //
GE07bhg4c01u:640: tasmād ācāryādīnāṃ vadhe pāpaṃ syād eva /
GE07bhg4c01u:641: na caihikaṃ sukham api syād ity āha svajanam iti //36//
GE07bhg4c01u:642: Baladeva: nanu agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:643: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:646: ity ukter eṣāṃ ṣaḍ-vidhyenātatāyināṃ yukto vadha iti cet tatrāha pāpam iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:647: etān hatvā sthitān asmān pāpam eva bandhu-kṣaya-hetukam āśrayet /
GE07bhg4c01u:648: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ ātatāyinam āyāntam ity ādikam artha-śāstraṃ mā hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtāni iti dharma-śāstrāt durbalam /
GE07bhg4c01u:649: artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:651: tasmād durbalārtha-śāstra-balena pūjyānāṃ droṇa-bhīṣmādīnāṃ vadhaḥ pāpa-hetur eveti /
GE07bhg4c01u:652: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmīty ārabhyoktam upasaṃharati tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:655: na hi gurubhir bandhu-janaiś ca vināsmākaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:657: he mādhaveti śrīpatis tvam aśrīke yuddhe kathaṃ pravartayasiīti bhāvaḥ //36//
GE07bhg4c01u:660: yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahata-cetasaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:662: kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum /
GE07bhg4c01u:664: Śrīdhara: nanu tavaiteṣām api bandhu-vadha-doṣe samāne sati yathaivaite bandhu-vadha-doṣam aṅgīkṛtyāpi yuddhe pravartate /
GE07bhg4c01u:665: tathaiva bhavān api pravartatāṃ kim anena viṣādenety ata āha yadyapīti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c01u:666: rājya-lobhenopahataṃ bhraṣṭa-vivekaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ te ete duryodhanādayo yadyapi doṣaṃ na paśyanti,
GE07bhg4c01u:667: tathāpi asmābhir doṣaṃ prapaśyadbhir asmāt pāpāt nivartituṃ kathaṃ na jñeyaṃ nivṛttāv eva buddhiḥ kartavyety arthaḥ //37-38//
GE07bhg4c01u:668: Viśvanātha: nanv ete tarhi kathaṃ yuddhe vartante /
GE07bhg4c01u:670: Baladeva: nanu āhūto na nivarteta dyūtād api raṇād api viditaṃ kṣatriyasyeti kṣatra-dharma-smaraṇāt tair āhūtānāṃ bhavatāṃ yuddhe pravṛttir yukteti cet tatrāha yadyapīhi dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c01u:671: pāpe pravṛttau lobhas teṣāṃ hetur asmākaṃ tu lobha-virahān na tatra pravṛttir iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:676: tathā ca śyenenābhicaran yajeta ity ādi śāstrokte 'pi śyenādāv ivāniṣṭānubandhitvād yuddhe 'smin naḥ pravṛttir na yukteti /
GE07bhg4c01u:677: āhūta ity ādi śāstraṃ tu kula-kṣaya-doṣaṃ vinā bhūta-viṣayaṃ bhāvi /
GE07bhg4c01u:682: dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta //39//
GE07bhg4c01u:683: Śrīdhara: tam eva doṣaṃ darśayati kula-kṣaya ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:685: uta api avaśiṣṭaṃ kṛtsnam api kulam adharmo 'bhibhavati vyāpnotīty arthaḥ //39//
GE07bhg4c01u:686: Viśvanātha: kula-kṣaya iti sanātanāḥ kula-parasparā-prāptatvena bahu-kālataḥ prāptā ity arthaḥ //39//
GE07bhg4c01u:687: Baladeva: doṣam eva prapañcayati kula-kṣaya iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:688: kula-dharmāḥ kulocitā agni-hotrādayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ kula-paraspara-prāptāḥ praṇaśyanti kartur vināśāt /
GE07bhg4c01u:689: utety apy arthe kṛtsnam ity anena sambadhyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:690: dharme naṣṭe saty avaśiṣṭaṃ bālādi-kṛtsnam api kulam adharmo 'bhibhavati satīty arthaḥ //39//
GE07bhg4c01u:695: Śrīdhara: tataś ca adharmābhibhavād ity ādi //40//
GE07bhg4c01u:697: adharma eva tā vyabhicāre pravartayatīti bhāvaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c01u:699: asmad-bhartṛbhir dharmam ullaṅghya yathā̆akula-kṣaya-lakṣaṇe pāpe vartitaṃ,
GE07bhg4c01u:700: tathāsmābhiḥ pātivratyam avajñāya durācāre vartitavyam iti durbuddhi-hatāḥ kula-striyaḥ praduṣyeyur ity arthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c01u:705: Śrīdhara: evaṃ sati saṅkara ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:707: hi yasmāt luptāḥ piṇḍodaka-kriyā yeṣāṃ te tathā /
GE07bhg4c01u:709: Baladeva: kulasya saṅkaraḥ kula-ghnānāṃ narakāyaiveti yojanā /
GE07bhg4c01u:710: na kevalaṃ kula-ghnā eva narake patanti,
GE07bhg4c01u:711: kintu tat-pitaro 'pīty āha patantīti hir hetau /
GE07bhg4c01u:712: paṇḍādi dātṝṇāṃ putrādīnām abhāvād vilupta-piṇḍādi-kriyā santas te narakāyaiva patanti //41//
GE07bhg4c01u:717: Śrīdhara: ukta-doṣam upasaṃharati doṣair iti dvābhyāṃ /
GE07bhg4c01u:719: jāti-dharmā varṇa-dharmāḥ kula-dharmāś ceti ca-kārād āśrama-dharmādayo 'pi gṛhyante //42//
GE07bhg4c01u:722: Baladeva: ukta-doṣam upasaṃharati doṣair iti dvābhyāṃ /
GE07bhg4c01u:732: utsannāḥ kula-dharmā yeṣām iti utsanna-jāti-dharmānām apy upalakṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c01u:746: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam /
GE07bhg4c01u:748: Śrīdhara: bandhu-vadhādhyavasāyena santy upamāne āha aho batetyādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:749: svajanaṃ hantum udyatā iti yat etan-mahat-pāpaṃ kartum adhyavasāyaṃ kṛtavanto vayam /
GE07bhg4c01u:750: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam ity arthaḥ //44//
GE07bhg4c01u:752: Baladeva: bandhu-vadhādhyavasāyenāpi pāpaṃ sambhāvyānupapannāha aho iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:757: dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet //45//
GE07bhg4c01u:758: Śrīdhara: evaṃ santaptaḥ san mṛtyum evāśaṃsamāna āha yadi mām ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:759: apratīkāraṃ tuṣṇīm upaviṣṭaṃ māṃ yadi haniṣyanti tarhi tad-dhananaṃ mama kṣemataram atyantaṃ hitaṃ bhavet pāpāniṣpatteḥ //45//
GE07bhg4c01u:761: Baladeva: nanu tvayi bandhu-vadhād vinivṛtte 'pi bhīṣmādibhir yuddhotsukais tva-vadhaḥ syād eva tataḥ kiṃ vidheyam iti cet tatrāha yadi mām ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:764: bhīṣmādayas tu na tat-pāpa-phalaṃ prāpsyanty eveti bhāvaḥ //45//
GE07bhg4c01u:769: Śrīdhara: tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam uktvety ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:770: saṅkhye saṅgrāme rathopasthe rathasyopari upāviśat upaviveśa /
GE07bhg4c01u:771: śokena saṃvignaṃ prakampitaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yasya saḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c01u:778: Baladeva: tataḥ kim abhūd ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam utveti /
GE07bhg4c01u:779: saṅkhye yuddhe rathopasthe rathopari upāviśat upaviveśa /
